channel.title: Minescape
channel.description:
[center][img]http://cdn.ihostinghq.com/minecrft/ThemeBuilder/7htn_w5h3_Minescapefdfdf.png[/img]
[size=20pt][i][b]Welcome to Minescape![/b][/i][/size]
Minescape is a huge world where you can travel and discover manny things This world needs a hero so they are keeping tournements,Festivals,Events to see what hero they should take They want a strong! no no They want a nice and strong hero a hero who wants to help his followers and fellow hero's So take your chance to become that hero in the mighty world of Minescape
[url=http://www.minescape.org/forum]Forum[/url] [url=http://minescapewebclient.webs.com/]Pay Now[/url] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/7nippzrsk0j4z54/Minecape.jar]Download Now[/url]
Stuff There Is That You Can Do: Bossing Events (Hosted By The Staff) Wildernes PK
Minigames: Duelling Arena Tzhaar Barrows Pest Control Warriors Guild Dungeoneering
We have almost all skills working corectly we are still coding and changing stuff
Team: Mr Minecraft (Skrillex_Craft) Legendary Pk Demonblood "Spot Open For A Coder"(We lost our coder due problems with our host so we are searching for a new coder who wants to help and enjoy the time with us)
Media:
Custom Client (By Demonblood) [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/14j3y2a.png[/img]
Custom Forum By (Mr Minecraft Akka Skrilex_Craft) [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2iayix0.jpg[/img]
Random pics: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/1zdbsw8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/k9uyvp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/dywrhl.png[/img]
[/center]

item.title: Minescape
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“DukeDice, post:4, topic:536510”]Error connecting to server when trying to log in. Maybe you have portforwarding issues?[/quote]il try to re change everything so people can login thanks for the help everyone who has helped can get staff position on the site and on the server and again thanks to help me ferther with this issue i was already thinking Fude no one is entering but ok thats also the issue do you get the error on both clientsyes/no? if it is only the webclient il change it as fast as possible please register on the page so i can give you the mod rank there

Edit:
Can you try again please?

Read full topic

item.title: Minescape

item.description:
@DukeDice wrote:

Error connecting to server when trying to log in. Maybe you have portforwarding issues?

item.title: Minescape
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“Ykcud, post:2, topic:536510”]The webclient doesn’t work. I tried both via the link you provided and going through the link from your forums (both of them).[/quote]does it give a erro?r

Edit:
Rechecked the whole codes of our clients they have the right ip and port so they should be working correctly are you sure you got the latest version of jdk/java?

We are looking ferther of annyone else has this problem please post about it here so i can fix it asap

Read full topic

item.description:
